about_the_game:
Sample the sexual adventure of Intergalactic Eustasy, an Erotic Sci-Fi RPG adventure game like none other. Play as Penny Patty Piper, a spunky space explorer who is as tough as she is horny.

Battle alien creatures as you make your way across the galaxy in search of 5 magical stones that may just lead Penny to a life of infinite sexual pleasure.

Intergalactic Ecstasy combines Science Fiction Action-Shooter gameplay with an engaging, hot erotic story and realtime-3D sexual encounters where you control the view and the action.

The Intergalactic Ecstasy demo showcases battle and exploration, along with the type of steamy sexual interactions that take place within the full game.

content_descriptors.notes: Intergalactic Ecstasy contains nudity, graphic sexual content and mature language and themes throughout. The game also contain scenes of consensual intense sexual encounters with humans, monsters and/or supernatural creatures. Intergalactic Ecstasy is intended for mature audiences only. All characters in the game are above the age of eighteen years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 GPU w/ 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4500 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 GPU w/ 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In this Epic Sexual Adventure , Penny Patty Piper travels the universe fighting monsters and completing Heroic Sexual Challenges to earn the fabled Erotesian Stones, the keys to unlocking the path to a Planet where Sexual Pleasure is the purpose of life.
